解压题目给的压缩包，得到一个key和txt。

```
python3 RsaCtfTool.py --publickey /smy/gy.key  --private

python3 RsaCtfTool.py --key /smy/private.key   --dumpkey

n: 76775333340223961139427050707840417811156978085146970312315886671546666259161
e: 65537
d: 49807846676324857039001173611017456460524559498389088122317223352151924725265
p: 273821108020968288372911424519201044333
q: 280385007186315115828483000867559983517

```

python脚本：

```python
import gmpy2
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes, bytes_to_long

n = 76775333340223961139427050707840417811156978085146970312315886671546666259161
e = 65537
d = 49807846676324857039001173611017456460524559498389088122317223352151924725265
p = 273821108020968288372911424519201044333
q = 280385007186315115828483000867559983517 

c = 0

# 计算明文m
def cal_m(c, d, n):
    return pow(c, d, n)

with open('fllllllag.txt', 'rb') as file1:
    c = bytes_to_long(file1.read())

m  = cal_m(c, d, n)
print(long_to_bytes(m)) # b'\x02c\x8bL\xc2u\x86\xc6\xbe\x00flag{_2o!9_CTF_ECUN_}'
```

但是实际的flag是：flag{2o!9CTFECUN}
